Reviews.Title: Shoulda checked
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Not what I expected.  Big attraction was 12V power and DVD to use on boat without running generator.  Picture quality not on par with other LED's (low contrast ratio?)  Sound (speakers) is the poorest I've heard.  Check it out before you buy.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfactory
Reviews.Author: Phillip J. Napper Sr.
Reviews.Content: The tv never performed from the time I took it out of the packaging container. Since I had more to do than work with a non working tv set it exceeded the 90 day warranty period. After several very heated conversations with the manufacturer (Super Sonic)that the tv was flawed they asked that I return it to their warehouse at my expense and they would repair my set an return it to me. The turn around time was quick. the only problem is they returned the same tv with out repairing it. I again contacted the dealer and stated that i would only accept a new tv since I had so much problem with them. They agreed and sent to me a new tv which was not the same model.The original model was a combination DVD player and tv. I received back a tv only. After more than 6 months trying to get some attention and satisfaction I decided to just keep the tv as received rather than going through more agony and expense.This is my story and I'm sticking to it. The bottom line is I will not purchase another Super Sonic product.Phillip J. Napper Sr

Reviews.Title: No DVD player in product we received
Reviews.Author: Aburch
Reviews.Content: We ordered this product for our motorhome.  I was seriously dissapointed when we received the product and found out that it did not have a DVD player as advertised.  I'm sure they just sent us the wrong product but is it a huge inconvenience.  Hopefully they can resolve the problem.

Reviews.Title: Picture okay, but poor sound for DVDs
Reviews.Author: Claire
Reviews.Content: Started using this TV recently on our boat.  It works fine on 12v for TV reception:  picture quality good and sound okay; but when playing DVDs, with it cranked all the way up to 100 for sound, it was still hard to hear.  This happened whether we used the built-in DVD player, or a separate DVD player.  The funny thing was, if we switched the language to something other than English, the sound quality was better/louder.  It's not terrible, but it could be better.

Reviews.Title: ehhh
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: it did not work when we received it. the company tried blaming ups saying it was damaged during delivery. the product was not physically damaged. it just did not work, the picture was blurry and it wouldn't play a dvd

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: R. Lutz "1fotonut"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this tv for our camper. the first trip in spring of 2012 the dvd quit working. We sent it back and they did replace it. We've used it now on about five camping trips the sound is terrible and now the dvd locked up and the tv won't even come on. Looks like I'm out the $200. Don't buy a supersonic tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Diane M Surprenant
Reviews.Content: We use this TV at our summer cottage...wonderful color, easy to use. Has  all the features we were looking for, for half the price.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: walleye-master
Reviews.Content: works good for in a camper out on the ice for the size and money well spent and the granson can watch a movie when bored

ProductInfo.Features:
22" Widescreen HD LED TV
Built-in DVD Player
Slim LED Design
Resolution: 1366 x 768
High Definition Digital ATSC TV Tuner
ProductInfo.Name: Supersonic 22" 12 Volt WIDESCREEN LED HDTV WITH BUILT-IN DVD PLAYER
